footer_title_b: Institute of History of the Academy of Sciences of the Republic of Uzbekistan
footer_title_p: â€” a research institution that studies the history of the Uzbek nation and its statehood, coordinates scientific research in the field of history, and trains highly qualified scientific personnel.
rights: Institute of History of the Academy of Sciences of Uzbekistan, all rights reserved
history_title: Brief information on the establishment of the Academy
journal_context: dedicated to any issue and stage of the history of the Uzbek people and statehood, scientific innovation, used primary sources and scientific literature are clearly indicated, the main idea (content) has not been published before works (articles, information, documents with an introduction) are accepted.
home_about_p: The scientists of the institute have been studying the unlit pages of the history of our country, the ethnogenesis and ethnic history of the Uzbek people, the history of the rich material and spiritual culture of Uzbekistan. Since the establishment of the institute, the major republics of Russia and Central Asia Scientific-methodical conferences, roundtable discussions, seminars and symposia were published in the form of collections of articles on the subject of 'current problems of history' in cooperation with scientific centers During the Soviet period, the science of history had a purely ideological and political character and served to promote the communist ideology Many problems in the history of Uzbekistan were objectively evaluated from a new perspective. The Decision of the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated July 27, 1998 'On improving the activities of the Institute of History of the Academy of Sciences of the Republic of Uzbekistan' became the basis for the strategic change of historical tasks.
home_about_h3: The Institute of History was founded in 1943 (until 1970 - the Institute of History and Archeology of the USSR Academy of Sciences) under the name of the Institute of Language, Literature and History, a branch of the USSR Academy of Sciences.
